subject: College Athletics
Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
Women and Girls
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Families and Family Life
lead_paragraph: Longtime female coaches say that many qualified candidates, especially those who are mothers or plan to be, leave the profession rather than juggle the demands of coaching and motherhood.
snippet: Longtime female coaches say that many qualified candidates, especially those who are mothers or plan to be, leave the profession rather than juggle the demands of coaching and motherhood.
